Interface com.chimu.form.database.CompoundColumn

public interface CompoundColumn
extends Column
CompoundColumns allow you to treat multiple basic database columns as a single entity. They enable you to build more complex data types to use for Slot columns than the database provides.

A CompoundColumn is the "Composite" in a Composite Pattern.

See Also:
Column, BasicColumn
